name: leftovers
effect: Held: Heals the holder by 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.
short_effect: Held: Restores 1/16 (6.25%) holder’s max HP at the end of each turn.

flavor_text.black-white: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder’s HP is gradually restored during battle.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder’s HP is gradually restored during battle.
